## Feedback

Confused by anything? Have a burning question you didn't get to ask? Did we miss a topic you wanted us to cover? Please leave us feedback by opening an [issue](https://github.com/DavisVaughan/2019-useR-workshop-design-for-humans/issues)! This is very helpful for us so we can improve the workshop over time.

Feel free to open these issues in real time during class!
